comments:
NullPointerException when re-running a test after removing the security certificate.

Using the TPTP-4.2.0-200606080100 driver (IBM JRE V1.5.0 GA) between two XP boxes, re-running a test (e.g. manual test) on the remote machine AFTER removing the original security certificate (preference dialog) causes the following exception:
